swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.ir

Class IntermediateCodeGeneratorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.ir.IntermediateCodeGeneratorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntermediateCodeGenerator

    public class IntermediateCodeGeneratorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntermediateCodeGenerator
    Intermediate Code Generator. Generates Intermediate Code (TAC - Three Address Code) from a given AST (Abstract Syntax Tree). The given AST is expected to be correct. If an incorrect AST is given the behaviour of the IntermediateCodeGenerator is indeterminate and IntermediateCodeGeneratorExceptions may be thrown.
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    "Frank Zechert", "Danny Maasch", kaworu

      • generateIntermediateCode

        public java.util.List<Quadruple> generateIntermediateCode(AST ast)
                                                   throws IntermediateCodeGeneratorException
        Description copied from interface: IntermediateCodeGenerator
        Generates quadruple representation of three address code from the correct abstract syntax tree (AST).
        Specified by:
        generateIntermediateCode in interface IntermediateCodeGenerator
        Parameters:
        ast - The semantically correct abstract syntax tree.
        Throws:
        IntermediateCodeGeneratorException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • process

        void process(ASTNode node)
       throws IntermediateCodeGeneratorException
        Process the given node and create the corresponding TAC. Processed nodes will push intermediate results onto the stack to be used by other nodes if needed.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to process.
        Throws:
        IntermediateCodeGeneratorException - An error occurred while executing the IntermediateCodeGenerator.
